dataList.content: Pilgrimage of Compassion New E.G.O Extraction
[Pilgrimage of Compassion New E.G.O Extraction] will be available during the event period.
[Pilgrimage of Compassion New E.G.O Extraction] features Gloria Spenta Gregor, Ordine: Collasso Faust, and Rimanere Se Stessi Hong Lu, and it offers higher Extraction rates for the said E.G.O.
Elegia della Marea Ishmael can only be obtained as a [Pilgrimage of Compassion Event Reward]; it cannot be obtained via Extraction, Dispenser, or Yisang Exchange.

※ E.G.O, once Extracted, are removed from the Extraction pool. This means that once an E.G.O is obtained, it cannot be Extracted again.
(In Yisang Exchange, already-obtained E.G.O will be labeled “Owned”, and cannot be exchanged for.)
Gloria Spenta Gregor, Ordine: Collasso Faust, and Rimanere Se Stessi Hong Lu do not appear from other Extractions or the Dispenser.
Please take note that Gloria Spenta Gregor, Ordine: Collasso Faust, and Rimanere Se Stessi Hong Lu can be obtained only via the [Pilgrimage of Compassion New E.G.O Extraction].
[Pilgrimage of Compassion New E.G.O Extraction] ends with the end of the event period.

Please note that, once the [Pilgrimage of Compassion New E.G.O Extraction] is over, Gloria Spenta Gregor, Ordine: Collasso Faust, and Rimanere Se Stessi Hong Lu cannot be obtained from other Extractions or Yisang Exchanges of other Extractions.
